mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (id, organizationid, username, name,mobile,fullpinyin, email,createuser,orginternalcode,createdate) VALUES (s_users.nextval,11,#{username},#{name},#{mobile},#{fullpinyin},#{email},'admin','.1.1.',sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select u.*,rownum rownu from USERS u where rownum<=#{start}+#{length} )tt where tt.rownu>#{start} order by tt.username desc
